title: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be displayed even if the dataset is not set.
OB: An error is displayed when attempting to create a new table group without setting the dataset. As a result, the user is unable to define any groups.
EB: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be displayed even if the dataset is not set. To reproduce, add a table report item without setting the dataset and then try to create a new table group. The user should be able to define a group regardless of whether or not the dataset is defined.
SR:
1. Add a table report item without setting the dataset.
2. Create a new table group.
3. Verify that the user is able to define a group even without a dataset.
